column3: ilá al-ṣabāḥ bilā khawfin walā ḥadhar
fī makān rafī‘ julās anā wal-ḥabīb wal-kās

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. istihlāl. qaṣīdah. munsariḥ lilmu‘tamid bn ‘ubbād
al-ṣan‘ah. istihlāl. tawshīḥ raml lābin sahil

column2: lays lī fī al-amr ḥukmun ba‘damā

column3: azīd fī al-malīḥ ‘ishqā malaknī al-gharām ḥaqqā
